mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRE_PRODUCT_OUT ( stock_id, pre_amount, pre_price, cust_id, create_user_id ) VALUES ( #{stockId}, #{preAmount}, #{prePrice}, #{custId}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT preProductOut.id,product.brand_id,brand.name brand_name,product.id product_id,product.product_no,product.product_name,tech.id tech_id,tech.name tech_name,thickness.id thickness_id,thickness.name thickness_name,product.amount,price.price ,identify.id identify_id,identify.name identify_name, quantity.id quantity_id,quantity.name quantity_name, manufactor.id manufactor_id,manufactor.name manufactor_name, preProductOut.pre_amount preAmount,preProductOut.pre_price prePrice, preProductOut.cust_id custId FROM t_pre_product_out preProductOut LEFT JOIN t_product product ON preProductOut.product_id = product.id LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify ON identify.id = stock.identify_id LEFT JOIN t_quantity quantity ON quantity.id = stock.quantity_id LEFT JOIN t_price price on price.product_id = stock.product_id and price.quantity_id = stock.quantity_id LEFT JOIN t_manufactor manufactor on manufactor.id = stock.manufactor_id
